Articles.Content:
Build Two big space stations, then dock them using a connector that has two docking ports on both sides.

Then get pictures of deorbiting both stations by crashing a rocket into the connector node and stations.

Build Two big space stations, then dock them using a connector that has two docking ports on both sides.

Then get pictures of deorbiting both stations by crashing a rocket into the connector node and stations.

No...

The spirit of the challange fits with you screen name, but still.

No.

Why?

The crash is just a gimmick, the real challenge is deorbiting both stations at once.

This is why the challenge guidelines exist, they help people make fun challenges that others will want to try, I suggest you check them out

Please try again later.
